verses.text: \w For|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w himself|strong="H6440"\w*. Judge thou, O Lord, \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H1732"\w* wrong \w me|strong="H6440"\w*: overthrow \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H1732"\w* fight \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.
Take hold \w of|strong="H3068"\w* arms \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shield: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* rise \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* help \w me|strong="H1288"\w*.

Bring out \w the|strong="H8085"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shut up \w the|strong="H8085"\w* way against \w them|strong="H8055"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* persecute \w me|strong="H5315"\w*: say \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* thy salvation.

Let \w them|strong="H0854"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* confounded \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ashamed \w that|strong="H3068"\w* seek \w after|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul. Let \w them|strong="H0854"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* turned back \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* confounded \w that|strong="H3068"\w* devise \w against|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H7311"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H0853"\w* become \w as|strong="H3068"\w* dust before \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wind: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w the|strong="H3605"\w* angel \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* straiten \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w way|strong="H6440"\w* become dark \w and|strong="H6440"\w* slippery; \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* angel \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord pursue \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* without \w cause|strong="H7121"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* hidden \w their|strong="H3605"\w* net \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* unto destruction: without \w cause|strong="H7121"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* upbraided \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul.

Let \w the|strong="H3068"\w* snare which \w he|strong="H3068"\w* knoweth not come upon \w him|strong="H5439"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w the|strong="H3068"\w* net which \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath hidden catch \w him|strong="H5439"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w the|strong="H3068"\w* net which \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath hidden catch \w him|strong="H5439"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* into \w that|strong="H3068"\w* very snare let \w them|strong="H5439"\w* fall.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* delighted \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* salvation.

All \w my|strong="H3068"\w* bones \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* say: \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w like|strong="H4270"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* thee? \w Who|strong="H3068"\w* deliverest \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w poor|strong="H4270"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hand \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* stronger \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w*; \w the|strong="H0853"\w* needy \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w poor|strong="H4270"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* strip \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

Unjust witnesses rising \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w asked|strong="H1875"\w* \w me|strong="H1875"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* knew \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* repaid \w me|strong="H3925"\w* evil \w for|strong="H3068"\w* good: \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* depriving \w me|strong="H3925"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* soul.

\w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* troublesome \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H0376"\w* clothed \w with|strong="H0376"\w* haircloth. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* humbled \w my|strong="H7200"\w* soul \w with|strong="H0376"\w* fasting; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* prayer \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* turned \w into|strong="H0376"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* bosom.

\w As|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* neighbour \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w as|strong="H1696"\w* an own brother, \w so|strong="H1696"\w* did I please: \w as|strong="H1696"\w* \w one|strong="H3956"\w* mourning \w and|strong="H1696"\w* sorrowful \w so|strong="H1696"\w* \w was|strong="H8193"\w* I humbled.

\w But|strong="H1245"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* rejoiced against \w me|strong="H7291"\w*, \w and|strong="H7965"\w* came together: scourges \w were|strong="H7291"\w* gathered together upon \w me|strong="H7291"\w*, \w and|strong="H7965"\w* \w I|strong="H7965"\w* knew not.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H5869"\w* separated, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* repented not: \w they|strong="H3068"\w* tempted \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* scoffed \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* scorn: \w they|strong="H3068"\w* gnashed \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* teeth.

\w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w when|strong="H3068"\w* wilt thou look upon \w me|strong="H6440"\w*? rescue thou soul \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* malice: \w my|strong="H3068"\w* only \w one|strong="H0776"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* lions.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H8085"\w* thanks \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thee \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* great church; \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* praise thee \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* strong \w people|strong="H8085"\w*.

Let \w not|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemies wrongfully rejoice \w over|strong="H0853"\w* \w me|strong="H3467"\w*: \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* hated \w me|strong="H3467"\w* without cause, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* wink \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* eyes.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* spoke indeed peaceably \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* speaking \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* anger \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w they|strong="H3068"\w* devised guile.

\w And|strong="H7665"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* opened \w their|strong="H3605"\w* mouth wide \w against|strong="H8104"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* said: Well \w done|strong="H3605"\w*, well \w done|strong="H3605"\w*, \w our|strong="H3605"\w* eyes \w have|strong="H3605"\w* seen \w it|strong="H8104"\w*.
Thou hast seen, O \w Lord|strong="H6662"\w*, \w be|strong="H4191"\w* not thou silent: O \w Lord|strong="H6662"\w*, depart not \w from|strong="H7451"\w* \w me|strong="H8130"\w*.

Arise, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* attentive \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* judgment: \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* cause, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
Judge me, O Lord my God according to thy justice, and let them not rejoice over me.
Let them not say in their hearts: It is well, it is well, to our mind: neither let them say: We have swallowed him up.
Let them blush: and be ashamed together, who rejoice at my evils. Let them be clothed with confusion and shame, who speak great things against me.
Let them rejoice and be glad, who are well pleased with my justice, and let them say always: The Lord be magnified, who delights in the peace of his servant.
Any my tongue shall meditate thy justice, thy praise all the day long.
